title: Plans for new gigafactory at Coventry Airport unveiled
lead: The facility is predicted to create thousands of green jobs and attract up to £2bn of investment

title: New waste-to-jet fuel plant takes off in Stanlow
lead: The new facility is predicted to produce 100 million litres of low carbon SAF every year

title: Global offshore wind investment broke new records in 2020
lead: Almost $30 billion was spent in the sector globally, new report estimates

title: Petition for wind turbine emoji scrapped
lead: A similarity to windmills is claimed to be the reason for the decision

title: Lightsource bp snaps up 845MW solar pipeline in Spain
lead: It will work with Iberia Solar to bring the project pipeline, which consists of five sites across the regions of Castilla la Mancha and Castilla y León, to ‘ready to build’ status

title: bp joins IBM’s network to advance quantum computing use in energy
lead: The energy giant will work with IBM to explore the use of quantum computing to solve business and engineering challenges and potential applications for driving efficiencies and reducing carbon emissions

title: Jaguar bids farewell to petrol past becoming ‘all-electric’ by 2025
lead: The move will see all vehicles of the brand abandon petrol engines

title: Drax welcomes innovative heat pump optimisation opportunity to flexibility portfolio
lead: Drax is excited to announce the optimisation of a commercial 380kWh ground source heat pump at a farm in south east Scotland.

title: Do You Know Your Energy Spend?
lead: As the annual budgeting process begins once more and the firm’s executives renew their demand to reduce operating expenses. More often than not, the solution lies in focusing on a cost that is rarely tracked in much detail: energy data.

title: Aussies are driving down livestock emissions with seaweed
lead: Red seaweed is claimed to reduce livestock methane emissions by more than 98%
